title: Camby on Draft Memories, Lessons Learned and Haircuts
itunes:title: Camby on Draft Memories, Lessons Learned and Haircuts
description:
From a UMass standout to a stalwart defender in the NBA, Marcus Camby had a storied career. Hours after this year's unusual, virtual NBA Draft, the 17-year veteran of the league reminisces on getting picked by the two-year-old Toronto Raptors back in 1996, making good for his mistakes and the magic of owning your own barbershop (MC23 for those in the Houston area).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
